text: @marcorubio FACT MATTER! THERE IS NO PROOF THAT THE BLM PROTEST HAS SPREAD COVID19! BECAUSE THEY WERE OUTSIDE, WEARING MASKS AND DON'T LISTEN TO TRUMP'S STUPIDITY, THERE HASN'T BEEN MANY REPORTS OF PROTESTERS WITH COVID19! Facts matter. Your opinion doesn't. Get the proof first next time.
